name: Aria Valen
summary: A military-raised operative whose involvement with [REDACTED] archives led to her disappearance.
backstory: Raised in a controlled military program, Aria became an intelligence asset before adulthood.
details: Her assignments involved archival containment and memory classification.

name: Kael Thorne
summary: Former naval officer who now takes private assignments; known for refusing direct recall orders.
backstory: Kael served in the fleet before leaving to operate as a private contractor.
details: Operates on the periphery of jurisdiction, often hired for convoy protection.

name: Lira Voss
summary: Operative embedded in outer colonies; mission logs partially [REDACTED].
backstory: Worked covertly for years; records are incomplete.
details: Subject to access restrictions—some logs are sealed.
